thag13.1:5.2: paddhagū → paddhagu (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); patthagū (sya1ed, sya2ed); paṭṭhagū (mr)
thag13.1:8.1: apaviddhaṃ → tadapaviddhaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thag13.1:13.3: Abyāpajjādhimuttassa → abyāpajjhādhimuttassa (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
thag13.1:16.1: ekagghano → ekaghano (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
